channel.title: 彭博-市场

item.title: 达拉斯联储主席洛丽-罗根过去在 "量化紧缩 "方面的经验让 1400 英里之外的华尔街投资者向她寻求指导
item.description:

item.title: 瑞士建材制造商 Holcim 公司首席执行官表示，该公司计划在北美分拆上市，其发展速度可能会超过欧洲同行
item.description:

item.title: 加拿大皇家银行（Royal Bank of Canada）的业绩超出分析师预期，原因是该行资本市场和财富管理业务的表现强于预期，抵消了贷款损失准备金的增加和支出的增加。
item.description:
Royal Bank of Canada beat analysts’ estimates as stronger-than-expected performance in the firm’s capital-markets and wealth-management businesses countered an increase in loan-loss provisions and higher expenses https://t.co/p0YbUoFOY5

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: 在 Klarna 称其人工智能助手能胜任 700 名全职座席人员的工作后，法国呼叫中心公司 Teleperformance 的股价下跌高达 28

item.title: "印度航空公司首席执行官坎贝尔-威尔逊（Campbell Wilson）在新加坡航空节上告诉 @avrilhongTV 说："目前，我们还能很好地避免交付延误。
item.description:
“For the moment we are reasonably well insulated” from delivery delays, Air India CEO Campbell Wilson tells @avrilhongTV at the Singapore Aviation Festival.

Here's how the airline is trying to plug potential capacity gaps https://t.co/Dce4Qt7yN8 pic.twitter.com/ElPEZyvGfd

— Bloomberg TV (@BloombergTV) February 28, 2024

item.title: 瑞典加入北约的时间可能会推迟到下周，因为匈牙利当选总统仍需就职
item.description:

item.title: "IndiGo 首席执行官 Pieter Elbers 在新加坡航空节上接受 @avrilhongTV 的独家专访时表示："我们已经实现了我们的运力目标。
item.description:
“We have been able to live up to our capacity guidance,” IndiGo CEO Pieter Elbers tells @avrilhongTV in an exclusive interview at the Singapore Aviation Festival.

Here's how the airline is supplementing the supply of new jets https://t.co/Dce4Qt7yN8 pic.twitter.com/Vq9BZr6hkZ

item.title: 极端主义的蔓延给央行行长们带来了挑战：面对他们认为对本国经济构成威胁的政策，他们应该在多大程度上偏离中立？
item.description:
The spread of extremism poses a challenge to central bankers: How far should they veer from neutrality in the face of policies they consider a threat to their economies? https://t.co/9qxeO1XcqZ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: 一家对冲基金自 2015 年成立以来每年都取得收益，该基金正押注新兴市场受困主权国家的反弹
item.description:
A hedge fund that has posted gains every year since its inception in 2015 is betting on a rally in distressed emerging-market sovereigns https://t.co/0Y5fiuTIFu

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: 在数千名实习医生因抗议政府增加医学院名额的计划而离职后，韩国实习医生计划在最后复工期限过后继续维持他们的劳工行动。
item.description:
South Korean trainee doctors plan to maintain their labor action past a deadline to return to work after thousands walked off the job to protest a government plan to increase medical school seats https://t.co/JbC8QdOIOD

item.title: 今年迄今为止，投资者在欧洲新债券销售中的出价达到创纪录的 2.6 万亿欧元，因为现金充裕的投资者纷纷涌入企业和公共部门债务领域
item.description:
Investors have bid a record €2.6 trillion for new bond sales in Europe so far this year as cash-rich investors plie into corporate and public-sector debt https://t.co/G64Zj9YdYd

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: 密歇根州初选结果，包括民主党票中的 "未承诺 "票。一切尽在今天的彭博早间播客。在此收听：
item.description:

item.title: 桑坦德网上银行推出人工智能服务，为 1,000 多支股票提供价格目标

item.title: 印度顶级航空公司印度航空公司（Air India）和印度国际航空公司（IndiGo）表示，它们的短期扩张计划仍在按部就班地进行，因为它们避开了困扰全球航空业的挥之不去的供应链阻塞问题
item.description:
India’s top airlines, Air India and IndiGo, say their short-term expansion plans remain on track as they sidestep the lingering supply-chain snarls that have rattled the global aviation industry https://t.co/AF9fRwY5c2

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: 美国司法部打击中国知识产权盗窃的行动受挫，一家中国芯片制造商被免于经济间谍和其他刑事指控

A Chinese chipmaker was cleared of economic espionage and other criminal charges in a setback for a US Justice Department crackdown on intellectual property theft by China https://t.co/YLn37e7f4T

item.title: 长期以来，中央银行一直坚守自己的独立性，不受政客影响。但现在，它们正在涉足政治。这是一个冒险的举动
item.description:
Central banks have long guarded their independence from politicians. But now they are wading into politics. And that’s a risky move https://t.co/xsBM7n3TH9

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: 拜登将签署一项行政命令，旨在防止外国实体获取大量美国人的个人数据，因为人们担心这些数据可能会被 "有关国家"，尤其是中国和俄罗斯所利用。
item.description:
Biden will sign an executive order designed to prevent foreign entities from accessing troves of Americans’ personal data amid worries it could be exploited by "countries of concern," particularly China and Russia https://t.co/MzRHaAFaDL

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: 沙特投资银行 SNB Capital 为一支新的石油和天然气基金融资超过 2.3 亿美元，旨在实现投资组合多元化
item.description:
Saudi investment bank SNB Capital raises more than $230 million for a new oil and gas fund as it aims to diversify its portfolio https://t.co/jx3Aw8Mvwm

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: 钢琴曾经是财富和社会地位的象征，但在中国，尤其是在中产阶级家庭中，钢琴似乎正在失去控制力
item.description:
Once a symbol of wealth and social status, the piano appears to be losing its grip on China, particularly among middle-class households https://t.co/DsDqYLMhlo

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）呼吁在全球范围内更广泛地采用传统医学，这是他发展印度经济计划的关键部分。
item.description:
Prime Minister Narendra Modi's call for the wider adoption of traditional medicine globally is a key part of his plan to grow India’s economy.

But this is carving a deep rift in the medical community. https://t.co/OgAVn2g8kX

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: 一项调查发现，英国市政厅正计划削减公园、休闲和艺术方面的资金，一半以上的市政厅预计将在未来几年内破产
item.description:
UK town halls are planning to slash funding for parks, leisure and arts with over half expecting to go bankrupt in the coming years, a survey found https://t.co/3tTjiymzS5

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: 在法国的美国公司去年对欧元区第二大经济体的前景重拾了一些信心，而在此之前的2022年，法国经济曾一度低迷，通胀率飙升使家庭和企业遭受重创。
item.description:
US companies in France regained some confidence in the outlook for the euro area’s second-biggest economy last year after a slump in 2022 when surging inflation hammered households and firms https://t.co/c7UEj4hpnZ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024
